definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: The review will be conducted in tandem with the EC 's overall review of the education system.
sentences.chinese: 这项检讨会与教统会的整体教育制度检讨同时进行。

sentences.english: The review will be conducted in tandem with the EC 's overall review of the education system.
sentences.chinese: 这项检讨会与教统会的整体教育制度检讨同时进行。

sentences.english: A self-critique of this kind can be made anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 自我反省与检讨可以在任何地方进行。

sentences.english: He hoped that USG would review the decision.
sentences.chinese: 他希望美国政府能重新检讨此项决定。

sentences.english: With your permission, I'd like to send this document along for your review.
sentences.chinese: 如果您允许，我想送您一起检讨这个文件。

sentences.chinese: 有关检讨外文系大一英文课程案，提请讨論。

sentences.english: We welcome and will review all products.
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎并会检讨所有产品。

sentences.english: We will review the new fans to make sure that they comply with the requirement described above.
sentences.chinese: 我们会检讨新的风扇，以确保其符合上述要求。

Chatper Five is a retrospection about the practice of civil rights in Guangxi.

sentences.english: Airplanes don't object to a preflight inspection.
sentences.chinese: 飞机不会反对你做飞行前检讨。

sentences.english: Suddenly the government is sounding self-critical.
sentences.chinese: 一时间，政府似乎做起了自我检讨。

sentences.english: Are you aware of any other beneficial uses of waters that should be considered in this review ?
sentences.chinese: 你认为在检讨中，还应考虑其它实益用途吗？

sentences.english: If you do not consider the customer complaint as the top-priority item, and never trace and analyze it actively.
sentences.chinese: 你不把客户抱怨当作优先解决的事项，主动追查检讨。

sentences.english: Overall their emphasis was on the character of Job, more than anything else.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，他们强调约伯要检讨自己，胜于其他一切。

sentences.english: There is a "review" of a product which is embedded with an affiliate link.
sentences.chinese: 有一个“检讨”一个产品是嵌入式与联属机构的联系。
